actions.committee: Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend section 31 of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934.

summary.text: Amends the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 to increase the transaction fees to be paid by national securities exchanges and registered brokers and dealers. Requires such fees to be paid quarterly. Increases the amount below which no payment is required.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 31 of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934.
